comments: This professor keeps you motivated and stimulates your interest but I don\'t think he\'s fair toward the best students in the class. He tends to give very easy exams and a second chance to students who don\'t do well in the midterm/final. It seems he cares more to be seen as a cool teacher than if you have actually learned something or not...

Great Professor. Put my ECO 110 professor to shame... His accent isn\'t THAT bad compared to what other people have said (especially if you have listened to other UAlbany Econ professors. Got a guaranteed B, which later became a B+, on the final for answering a question in class. He want all his students to do very well. Big recommendation for him.

Awesome Teacher... Best Eco Teacher I have had to date... His accent isnt as hard as you think (especially if you have experienced other Suny Albany Econ profs. Got a guaranteed B on the final for answering a question in class. TAKE HIM!

Best Economics Professor I have ever had. He is able to make a really tough and confusing topic very easy to comprehend. He is also very helpful if you see him for extra help. Class is also very interactive and extremely interesting. I learned a lot in this class because he makes international economics fun and i didn\'t think i would ever say that.

Tests are impossibly hard. He seems cool, tries to keep people engaged, asks questions in return he will give you an automatic A or B on exams. But, the questions are of course super hard. His accent is hard to understand. HW is hard. He lectures right from the book so its a chore to go to class. So Boring.

He\'s a good teacher that\'s very helpful. He tries to keep your attention by offering questions in class to give you good grades on tests if you pay attention you will know the answer. Try and take him if you can.
Teachers very helpful, by far one of the best Economics professors to take. Class is relatively easy as long as you do the necessary work and pay attention. I\'d say at the chance, take him.
Probably the best/nicest teacher I ever had. He wants his students to do well and pay attention.
Best Economics Professor at UAlbany. And incredibly attractive.
He is such a nice teacher. He\'s very helpful and tries to make everyone understand the material as much as possible. definitely take eco111 with him
this man rocks! very interesting classes, keeps it fresh and is very good at explaining things. he\'s extremely fair and is always helpful. just put the effort in and you will do well.

alex is great. he wants his students to do well and is willing to meet with you outside of class to go over the material. his classes are interesting and intriguing. he has great style and is very good looking. i suggest taking his class, there is a nice curve as well.
Excellent professor. Fair grading and expectations. Participate in the class discussions and you will do well.
